question: E____ as noted 除非另有說明

example.text:
Keep a minimum of 0.5 in. (12.7 mm) corner radius at a repair doubler, except as noted.
「在修補加強板處保持最小0.5英寸（12.7毫米）角半徑，除非另有說明。」

question: Unless O_____ specified 除非另有說明

example.text:
This level of inspection is made from within touching distance unless otherwise specified.
「除非另有說明，否則此檢查層級是在觸摸範圍內進行的。」
